Description.Text: The complex has a swimming pool and childrens pool built into the sheer mountain edge. From the sunbathing terraces around the pool, its possible to enjoy marvellous views over the Bay of Naples and the Island of Capri. Both pools are filled with fresh sea water. Next to the pools, there is a snack bar where you can relax and enjoy a pleasant drink. The complex also has a TV room and playground area for children
